title: Detective Conan: Shadows of Greed
premise: In the dark alleys of London, Detective Conan embarks on a thrilling chase against a group of lethal robbers targeting a notorious drug dealer. As secrets unravel, Conan confronts the deadly consequences of crime driven by greed.

shotlist.description: A quiet, eerie night in North London, the camera pans over a dimly lit residential street setting a suspenseful tone.
shotlist.image_generation_prompt: A quiet residential street in North London during night time, dim street lights casting long shadows, creating a suspenseful and eerie atmosphere.

voice_over.text: In the quiet of night, greed whispers louder than conscience.

shotlist.description: Inside a house, a group of shadowy figures prepare their weapons, tension fills the air.
shotlist.image_generation_prompt: Interior of a dimly lit room, a group of four shadowy figures wearing masks, quietly preparing knives and a BB gun, exuding a sense of danger and tension.

voice_over.text: A planned attack, with ill intentions at heart.

shotlist.description: A close-up of a digital clock striking 3:00 AM, then cut to a bedroom door forcefully opening.
shotlist.image_generation_prompt: Close-up on a digital clock reading 3:00 AM in a dark room, followed by a sudden scene of a bedroom door being kicked open, heightening the suspense.

voice_over.text: As the clock ticks, danger unfolds.

shotlist.description: A violent struggle ensues in the bedroom, a man is overpowered and stabbed, fear and chaos dominate.
shotlist.image_generation_prompt: A chaotic and violent struggle in a dimly lit bedroom, a man being overpowered and stabbed by masked assailants, conveying fear and desperation.

voice_over.text: In the face of greed, mercy is often forgotten.

shotlist.description: The robbers hastily grab drugs and cash, stuffing them into their bags, their movements quick and desperate.
shotlist.image_generation_prompt: Masked robbers in a cluttered room quickly grabbing stacks of cash and bags of drugs, stuffing them into their backpacks, movements hurried and desperate under dim light.

voice_over.text: Ill-gotten gains, now the prize of another's sin.

shotlist.description: Conan, standing in the shadows, observes the scene through his glasses, his expression intense and focused.
shotlist.image_generation_prompt: Conan in the shadows, wearing his iconic glasses, his expression intense and focused as he observes the crime scene.

shotlist.description: Police sirens wail in the distance as the robbers make a frantic escape, the tension escalates.
shotlist.image_generation_prompt: The robbers running out of the house, stuffing their loot, as police sirens wail in the background, creating a tense and urgent atmosphere.

voice_over.text: But even in haste, justice is on their trail.

shotlist.description: A high-speed chase ensues, Conan follows the robbers using his skateboard, dodging through London's narrow alleyways.
shotlist.image_generation_prompt: Conan on his high-tech skateboard, swiftly navigating through London's narrow, wet alleyways in pursuit of the robbers' vehicle, showcasing agility and determination.

voice_over.text: Hang on, we're not letting them get away!

shotlist.description: Flashbacks reveal the robbers planning the heist, showing maps and discussing their sinister plans.
shotlist.image_generation_prompt: Flashback scene in a dimly-lit room, robbers around a table with maps and cash, discussing their plan with a sense of urgency and secrecy.

shotlist.description: A dramatic confrontation as Conan corners the robbers in a dead-end alley, their faces reveal shock and fear.
shotlist.image_generation_prompt: Conan standing confidently at the entrance of a dead-end alley, the robbers trapped and showing expressions of shock and fear, the scene lit by a single overhead streetlight.

voice_over.text: Thought you could escape the law?

shotlist.description: The robbers are arrested, hands cuffed as police take them away, Conan watches silently, justice served.
shotlist.image_generation_prompt: The robbers handcuffed and being escorted by police into their vehicles, Conan watching from a distance, a look of resolve on his young face, under the flashing police lights.

voice_over.text: Justice, served under the watchful eyes of the night.

shotlist.description: Final shot of Conan walking away from the scene, his silhouette against the city lights, hinting at more mysteries to solve.
shotlist.image_generation_prompt: Conan's silhouette against the backdrop of London's glowing city lights at night, walking away from the camera, hinting at more adventures and mysteries.

voice_over.text: In the shadows of greed, the truth always emerges.
